tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Ok! As expected, we can see that the strategy closes after the trigger stage closes! The video in the next step shows what I see!

paragraphs.text: Let's unpack what happens after the trigger stage closes!
Can you see the strategy triggering five times in a row starting on Feb 28th, at 9 hs?

This happens because as soon as the strategy closes, the bot goes back to evaluating the Trigger On Event. That is what it usually does after a position is closed... look for more trading opportunities! This behavior is part of the normal functioning of the system, and a consequence of not defining the open, close, and manage stages.
